title: @Align_Centers
description: Moves the center of a dataset (DSET) to the center of a base volume (BASE) and optionally creates a transform matrix.

transform_matrix.title: Transform Matrix File
transform_matrix.description: Transform matrix needed for the shift applied to DSET.

shifted_dset.title: Shifted Dataset File
shifted_dset.description: Shifted Dataset aligned with the base volume.

shifted_child_dsets.title: Shifted Child Datasets File
shifted_child_dsets.description: Shifted child datasets aligned with the base volume.
